DFRobot_GS01.begin|block: Initializes the I2C address of the module and related configurations
DFRobot_GS01.getGestureType|block: Take the recognized gesture type, if successful, the RGB light on the product will light up the corresponding color.
DFRobot_GS01.getFaceNumber|block: Get the number of faces recognized in the current lens, if the number is greater than 0, the white LED light on the product will light up.
DFRobot_GS01.getFaceLocationX|block: Get the X-coordinate position of the face in the shot
DFRobot_GS01.getFaceLocationY|block: Get the Y-coordinate position of the face in the shot
